product_name: Easton Mountain Products Rimrock 3P Tent - 2013 Closeout
long_description: This 3-person tent provides enhanced internal space and headroom in a simple 4-pole design, allowing quick setup and effective sheltering on 3-season backpacking and camping trips.
short_description: This 3-person tent provides enhanced internal space and headroom in a simple 4-pole design, allowing quick setup and effective sheltering on 3-season backpacking and camping trips.
